fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Solve a player for X at night, at the cost of 4 points.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
During the day, choose a player who will be X for tonight.
If the player you’re solving for visits X, the faction will gain 8 points.
If the player you’re solving for does not visit X, you learn their role, who they visited, roleblock them, and they become “Solved 2 by 1”
Roleblock immune
